Dreadplague: Do not worry about that. I can cause that kind of fear too.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        "You're quite right, I had forgotten."  He thinks to himself
for a 
> moment, calming down considerably.  "However, I think that
particular skill 
> would best be used after the battle, thus sowing further confusion and 
> dissension.  That is, of course, only if you can control it enough
so as to 
> not be overwhelming.  A subtle paranoia will do quite nicely without
them 
> noticing anything is wrong."
